DESIGN CONSULTING

  • services
  • DESIGN CONSULTING
  • CLEANING & REPAIR

In the modern rug market there are many types of hand-made rugs, all with varying quality. We at Artisan Rug Gallery would like to offer you the education you need to understand and recognize a superior quality rug when you come across one. We will start by covering the basics of how an exquisite handmade rug is made and then move on to how you, the consumer, can discover the clues that indicate when a rug is really a work of art.

MORE ON ABOUT US

OUR CONSULTATION PROCESS

At Artisan Rug Gallery we think the most important factorts that you need to think about in purchasing a hand-made rug are threefold: do you like it? Are the colors going to work for you? And will this fit within your budget? If the answer is yes, then it is time to take a closer look. When looking at a handmade rug, remember that a quality carpet is more than just a high knot count and high-quality materials but also dye technique, the number of colors used, the sophistication of design, and whether you, the consumer, enjoy the rug!
